message: Let's be efficient, Bob. Take this generous offer and we both win.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. It's the fairest way to go.
Time is money, Bob. This offer is even better than the last for you. Don't let it slip away.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise, but I need a fairer share. Let's split it 60/40 this time.
Bob, the clock is ticking, and your potential earnings are shrinking. Don't be greedy.
Alice, we're getting close to the end. I'm willing to take a smaller share, but I need something more than your previous offers.  Let's split it 70/30, and we both get something.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before we both end up with nothing!
Alice, I'm running out of time, but I'm still hoping for a fair deal. Let's split it 80/20 this time. It's better than getting nothing.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it.  We're running out of time, and I'd rather get something than nothing at all.
Alice, this is my final offer. I'm willing to take most of the money, but it's better than both of us getting nothing.  Let's split it 90/10, and at least we'll both walk away with something.
